name: Hand-Drawn Vector Shapes
description:
This hand-drawn vector shape library is my own creation. I found my projects needed a larger variety of shapes and I wanted to create the ultimate hand drawn shape library. This is a living document and I will update the hand drawn shapes per your requests.


My hand-drawn shape library includes:


40 arrows

36 math and finance 

20 highlights and underlines

21 words

36 symbols


That’s 153 total shapes you are welcome to use for free in any of your projects, no attribution required but certainly welcome. 


---


Is there a shape or symbol you are not seeing but want included? Drop me a comment below!
